description:
##Deprecated package, install Vim-Tux.portable instead.##
	    Used libraries: Perl 5.22.1, Python 2.7.11, Python 3.5.1, Racket 6.4.0.4, Ruby 2.2.3, Lua 5.3.2, Tcl 8.6.4, libXpm.
	    Build provided by TuxProject.de - consider donating to help support their server costs.
summary: 64bit build of vim, compiled with all features enabled. This portable package does not generate the various .bat files (vimdiff.bat gvimdiff.bat view.bat and etc).
author: Build: TuxProject.de,  Developer: vim team
